180cm from 24 pattern repeats + 2 row width - 20cm from 3 pattern repeats minus three stitches this completes fans width-wise while avoiding yo at the ends of row abbreviations k3tog knit 4 together k4tog knit 4 together ktbl knit through the back loop p2sso pass the 2 slip stitches over p3sso pass the 3 slip stitches over pb place bead ptbl purl through the back loop rs right side s slip ws wrong side yo yarn on see special instructions for advice on why k3tog not k4tog in some row placing beads achieving k3tog / k4tog after yo © pat gordon-smith beaded lace pattern chart made using chart minder knit on rs purl on ws purl on rs knit on ws ktbl on rs ptbl on ws yo k3tog s2 knitwise k1 p2sso k4tog s3 knitwise k1 p3sso pb © pat gordon-smith beaded lace pattern instructions using 3 24mm needles cast on 51 stitches row 1 p1 *s3 knitwise k1 p3sso yo k1 5 times yo k4tog p1 ktbl twice p1 repeat from * s3 knitwise k1 p3sso yo k1 5 times yo k4tog p1 row 2 *k1 p13 k1 pb ptbl twice k1 repeat from * p13 k1 row 3 *p1 k13 p1 ktbl twice p1 repeat from * k13 p1 row 4 *k1 p13 k1 ptbl twice k1 repeat from * p13 k1 row 5 repeat row 1 row 6 repeat row 4 row 7 repeat row 3 row 8 repeat row 4 row 9 p1 *s3 knitwise pb k1 p3sso yo k1 5 times yo pb k4tog p1 ktbl twice p1 repeat from * to end row 10 repeat row 4 row 11 repeat row 3 row 12 *k1 p3 pb p6 pb p4 k1 ptbl twice k1 repeat from * to end row 13 k1 yo twice k3tog * p1 ktbl twice p1 s3 knitwise k1 p3sso yo k1 5 times yo k4tog repeat from * p1 ktbl twice p1 s2 knitwise k1 p2sso yo k1 twice row 14 p5 * k1 pb ptbl twice k1 p13 repeat from * k1 pb ptbl twice k1 p5 row 15 k5 * p1 ktbl twice p1 k13 repeat from * p1 ktbl twice p1 k5 row 16 p5 * k1 ptbl twice k1 p13 repeat from * k1 ptbl twice k1 p5 row 17 repeat row 13 row 18 repeat row 16 row 19 repeat row 15 row 20 repeat row 16 row 21 k1 yo twice k3tog * p1 pb ktbl twice p1 s3 knitwise k1 p3sso yo k1 5 times yo k4tog repeat from *
